summary:
june 2011:Petrophysical Peer Review RWE Dea Hamburg
2000 - '11: Independent Petrophysical Expert 
consulting mainly for.Shell Int. E&P
              Oil & Gas projects in: 
              China, Iran, Lybia, Algeria, Nigeria, Russia 
              Bitumen inTatarstan 
              CBM in Indonesia, Botswana, Australia and China.
1970 - '99: Int. Petroleum Engineer with Shell .
1974 - '85:Carreer diversion into Shell Coal Expl/Prod: 
               Expertise in Coal Petrophysics and Geophysics
               Posted in :
               Indonesia(3y), Southern Africa (2y) and UK (5y).
1985 - '99  main stream O&G Petrophysics, 
                posted in UK 4(y), Oman(5y), and Germany (6y)

Specialties: Coal, CBM and Oil & Gas Petrophysics
